name: defiproject
description: A system that allows users to mint a stablecoin (e.g., MyUSD) by locking volatile crypto assets (e.g., ETH) as collateral. The protocol maintains the peg to a fiat currency (e.g., $1) via over-collateralisation, liquidation, and governance mechanisms â€” without using fiat reserves or centralised control.
author: Alexander Locke
